alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 16 at 5:54AM AKST until November 17 at 5:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow with low visibility expected. South winds gusting to 40 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Near Passes of the Northeastern Brooks Range. * WHEN...Until 5 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Visibility one half mile or less at times. Large snow drifts may form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds and lowest visibility will be in passes and on the north side of passes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
